layout.midground: running vertically down the image toward the horizon
layout.background: densely packed, especially toward the center and sides

perception.setting: urban environment in a major city
perception.lighting: warm golden light from low sun casting elongated shadows and reflecting off glass surfaces

narration.main_narration: You are enveloped in a vibrant cityscape, where a mix of skyscrapers and tall buildings rises prominently against the clear sky. The scene captures the energy of an urban environment, with roads and streets running vertically down the image toward the horizon, leading your eye deeper into this bustling metropolis. Warm golden light from the low sun casts elongated shadows and beautifully reflects off glass surfaces, enhancing the dynamic atmosphere around you. This moment is filled with vitality and anticipation, inviting you to explore every corner of this lively city.
